Experience instant insights, automated data capture, multilingual transcription and translation services, summarization, and automatic document and email creation for enhanced team performance.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs):

ğŸ¤” How do I install the Synth AI Meeting Assistant for Chrome?
Visit the Chrome Web Store, search for "Synth Extension" click "Add to Chrome," and follow the installation prompts. Once installed, the Synth AI Meeting Assistant  will be accessible from your Chrome browser.
